pages.text: The Turntable will rotate blocks placed against it. Holding an Engineer's Hammer while looking at a side of the machine displays its rotating side and the turn direction associated with the targeted side.

The turn direction is set individually for each of the 4 sides around the turning axis, allowing for ±90° or 180° turns, depending on which side receives the redstone signal. $(br)Rightclicking with the Hammer will reorient it, sneaking while doing so will cycle through the Turntable's turn directions.
